meta.title: Mōchirīī Monthly Raffles
meta.intro: Once a month we run a raffle for active members. Sign up in-game, stay recently active & you're in the draw.

how: Sign up for the monthly raffle event in the guild menu.
Stay active close to event time so the roster reflects your presence.
Leadership draws winners & posts results with claim instructions.
rules: Eligible members logged in within the previous 2 days of event time.
Member must be signed up on the monthly event in the guild menu.
One entry per member unless an announcement specifies bonus entries.
Winners must claim within the window listed in the Discord post.

prizes: Special mention in the next spotlight
thisMonth.notes: Exact prizes may shift with availability.

note: Leadership is always willing to help whenever possible, even if something may be desired or needed outside of game. Just let us know if you're the winner & we'll do our best to accomodate for you when able to do so.
